definition: The term refers to the lowest level of a building, typically located at ground level. It is commonly used in the context of architecture and real estate to describe the main floor or the first floor of a structure.

examples.german: Das Büro befindet sich im Erdgeschoss.
examples.english: The office is located on the ground floor.

examples.german: Die Wohnung im Erdgeschoss hat einen Garten.
examples.english: The apartment on the ground floor has a garden.

examples.german: Im Erdgeschoss gibt es einen Supermarkt.
examples.english: There is a supermarket on the ground floor.
The ground floor is accessible without barriers.
The ground floor apartment has large windows.
